alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:11PM MDT until July 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Phillips County in northeastern Colorado... Central Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 610 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ovid, or 8 miles southwest of Julesburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 610 PM MDT, quarter size was reported 2 miles south of Ovid. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Sixteen-Mile Corner and Amherst. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
